All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminProfilesFragment
Fragment that displays and manages the list of user profiles for administrators.
Common
Common utility class providing shared methods for Firestore data handling.
CreateEventFragment
A bottom sheet fragment that provides a form for creating a new event.
DatePickerFragment
DatePickerFragment is a dialog fragment that displays a date picker to the user.
EditEventFragment
EditEventFragment is a BottomSheetDialogFragment that provides an interface for users to edit an existing event's details, such as name, description, duration, registration deadline, geolocation requirements, max entrants, and poster image.
Event
Represents an Event in the application, containing details about the organizer, associated facility, event description, poster, schedule, and registration limits.
EventAdapter
EventAdapter is a RecyclerView adapter for displaying a list of Event objects in a RecyclerView.
EventAdapter.OnEventClickListener
 
EventAdapter.ViewHolder
 
EventInfoFragment
A fragment displaying detailed information about an event in a bottom sheet dialog.
EventRepository
The `EventRepository` class is a singleton repository that provides access to Firestore operations for managing `Event` data, including adding, updating, retrieving, and removing event records.
EventRepositoryTest
 
EventsFragment
The EventsFragment class is responsible for displaying and managing the user's events, including events they organize and events they are signed up for.
EventsListAdapter
 
EventsListAdapter.ViewHolder
Initializes the ViewHolder, so that the grid can be populated
EventsViewModel
The EventsViewModel class is responsible for managing and organizing event-related data and operations for the associated view in a structured MVVM pattern.
EventsViewModelTest
 
EventTest
 
FacilitiesAdapter
FacilitiesAdapter is a custom RecyclerView.Adapter for displaying a list of Facility items in a RecyclerView.
FacilitiesAdapter.OnFacilityClickListener
Sets the function onFacilityClick to run when the on facility click listener activates
FacilitiesAdapter.ViewHolder
Initializes the views to be managed by the Adapter
FacilitiesFragment
FacilitiesFragment is a UI component in the app that displays a list of facilities associated with the current user.
Facility
Represents a Facility that hosts events, including details such as name, description, and photo.
FacilityAddFragment
FacilityAddFragment is a fragment responsible for providing the interface to add a new Facility.
FacilityEditFragment
FacilityEditFragment is responsible for displaying and managing the facility edit screen, allowing users to update facility information, including its name, description, and photo.
FacilityInfoFragment
FacilityInfoFragment displays detailed information about a selected facility in a bottom sheet dialog.
FacilityRepository
The `FacilityRepository` class is a singleton repository responsible for managing Firestore operations related to `Facility` data.
FacilityRepositoryTest
 
FacilityTest
 
FirestoreEmulator
FirestoreEmulator provides singleton access to Firestore instances configured for use with a local emulator, along with test instances of various repositories.
FormatDate
Utility class to format the dates given in long to dates given in a simpler string format
HasDocumentId
Interface for entities that have a Firestore document ID.
MainActivity
 
PermissionHelper
Helper class for handling photo-related permissions across different Android SDK versions.
PhotoManager
The PhotoManager class provides utility methods for handling photo operations, including compression, uploading to Firebase Storage, deletion, and generating default profile pictures.
PhotoManager.UploadCallback
Interface for a callback to handle upload success and failure.
PhotoPicker
Utility class for selecting a photo from a user's photos and returning the photo's Uri.
PhotoPicker.PhotoPickerCallback
Interface that can be used to access the selected photo's Uri
ProfileEditFragment
Fragment that allows a user to edit their profile information, including their name, email, phone number, notifications preferences, and organizer status.
ProfileFragment
ProfileFragment displays the user's profile information, allowing them to view and manage their personal details and access related sections (such as managing facilities if they are an organizer).
ProfileInfoFragment
ProfileInfoFragment is a BottomSheetDialogFragment that displays a popup with detailed profile information of a selected user.
ProfilesAdapter
ProfilesAdapter is a custom RecyclerView.Adapter for displaying a list of user profiles in a RecyclerView.
ProfilesAdapter.OnProfileClickListener
Sets the function onProfileClick to run when the on profile click listener activates
ProfilesAdapter.ViewHolder
Initializes the views to be managed by the Adapter
ProfileViewModel
ProfileViewModel is a ViewModel that manages and interacts with the data needed for the user profile screen.
ProfileViewModelTest
 
QRCodeGenerator
 
ScannedEventFragment
This is the fragment that displays the information of the event corresponding to the qr code that was scanned.
ScanQrFragment
Fragment responsible for scanning QR codes and displaying the associated event details.
ScanQrViewModel
ViewModel for handling QR code scanning functionality in the application.
ScanQrViewModelTest
 
Signup
Represents a Signup record for an Event, containing information about the user and event, as well as the signup timestamp and cancellation status.
SignupRepository
The `SignupRepository` class is a singleton repository that provides access to Firestore operations for managing `Signup` data.
SignupRepositoryTest
 
SignupTest
 
User
Represents a User in the application, including attributes such as name, role, and contact details.
UserRepository
The `UserRepository` class is a singleton repository responsible for handling Firestore operations related to `User` data management.
UserRepositoryTest
 
UserTest
